name: Global TB Caucus
goal: The Global TB Caucus works to build the political will to end TB, a treatable and curable disease.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Public Health
euInitiatives: European Parliament as a whole, with representatives in the ENVI and Development Committee; Horizon Europe and R&D for new medicines, vaccines and diagnostics for tuberculosis; AMR resolutions
